channel.title: Need help!
channel.description:
HELP ive been trying to get my compiler fixed for about 1 hour and 45 mins..... im new at this stuff i finally got my compiler working and now when i tried to run my "runserver.bat" file this comes up...... [code]exception in thread "main" java.lang.noclassdefFounderror C:/program caused by: java.lang.classnotfoundexception C:/program at java.netURlclassloader$1run<unknown source> [/code] and then a whole bunch of other crap!!! that took me forever to copy.... at the end it says.... [code]could not find the main class C:/Program. Program will exit [/code] What i have the "runserver.bat" file doing(when you right click > edit) it says..... [code] @echo off title TestScape Server java C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6 server pause[/code]
i have windows 7 incase you need that to help but.......... PLEASE FRIKEN HELP ME!!!!!!!!! :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused:

maybe i can help u through team viewer pm me your user and pass
